body: Since the `TFE_Op` has to be explicitly deleted itself by calling `TFE_DeleteOp`, I think it is more acceptable to delete its inference context explicitly as well.
body_html: Since the TFE_Op has to be explicitly deleted itself by calling TFE_DeleteOp, I think it is more acceptable to delete its inference context explicitly as well.
body_text: Since the TFE_Op has to be explicitly deleted itself by calling TFE_DeleteOp, I think it is more acceptable to delete its inference context explicitly as well.
